name: EMERGE
about_us:
In a world of non-stop news, Emerge brings non-stop hustle to the press office, crafting and landing stories that sit across traditional and emerging editorial verticals to bring brands fame.

We focus on getting ambitious, category defining brands (from multiple industries) into hearts, minds and hands of the audienceâ€™s that matter to them. name: India Art Fair
about_us:
India Art Fair is the leading platform to discover modern and contemporary art from South Asia. 

Taking place annually in Indiaâ€™s capital, New Delhi, the fairÂ presented in partnership with BMW India, reflectsÂ the cityâ€™s fast-developing local arts scene, while offering curated insights into the cultural landscapes of neighbouring countries.Â The fairâ€™s programme - which draws together galleries and artists, private foundations and arts charities, artistsâ€™ collectives, national institutions, cultural events and festivals - enables international audiences to engage in innovative ways with the cultural history and development of the region. The fair is committed to supporting arts education and professional development opportunities, recognising the crucial need to support the development of the local arts scene, and provide dedicated exhibition space to emerging galleries and arts organisations. 

Year-round, the fair aims to run an extensive programme of events, including education initiatives, artist commissions and pop-up programmes, aiming to increase audiences for the arts within India.

The 15th edition of the fair will take place at the NSIC Grounds, Okhla, New Delhi from 1 to 4 February 2024.

Het woord â€˜vibeâ€™ komt oorspronkelijk voort uit het engelse woord â€˜vibrationâ€™ wat staat voor 'trilling'. Wat voor soort trillingen? Alles en iedereen trilt. Miljarden trillingen zijn verspreid over het hele universum. Deze trillingen zijn te verstaan, te voelen en over te brengen, maar ze zijn niet direct zichtbaar voor het menselijke oog. Het is bij ons van belang om onze â€˜vibeâ€™ aan iedereen door te geven en deze ook zo goed mogelijk uit te dragen. The new breed of creatives. We are in love with creating innovative brands. We do this with passion, talent and ambition. Positivity , friendship and freedom. Call it what you will, we call it our 'vibe'. At vibe, we do more than expected. We know how to put together the perfect mix of strategy, technology, production and creativity to create value for your brand. Customers are partners. We wouldn't be here without them. No-nonsense, just kickass designs, branding, video & animation. The word "vibe" originally comes from the word "vibration". What kind of vibration? Everything and everyone vibrates. Billions of vibrations are spread throughout the universe. These vibrations can be understood, felt and transmitted, but they are not immediately visible to the human eye. It is important for us to pass on our 'vibe' to everyone and to transmit it in the best possible way. Therefore, we have made a number of specific vibrations visually to use as corporate identity elements. We have worked for: JBL, UnivÃ©, DJI, Insta 360, Harman/Kardon, Snelle, Grohe, Legamaster, Saxion Hogescholen, AT bookings, Don't waste culture, Topicus, Traffic Today, Anne-Marie Wonen Holten, RIHO, By Sidde, Gemeente Rijssen-Holten.

name: Cat Around Films
about_us: We have a passion for creating branded content that delivers results. Our work has brought real value to local, national, and international brands and organizations over the years, and we aim to continue evolving the scope of our services with time. We love telling our clientsâ€™ stories and capturing powerful moments to support them, and we work closely with them to create content that communicates both authenticity and credibility. Our story began in March of 2014, when Cat Around Films came together with the idea of there being a tremendous need for quality content. It is our belief that the play button is your most important tool for conveying key messaging to your community. We work with both growing and established brands to tell their stories through cinematic campaigns, education, training, and events. Our creative film production and content strategies are often used as part of sales and lead-generating initiatives that bring results, no matter how niche or precise the objective may be. We manage all aspects of planning and creative direction that occur prior to filming. The pre-production process is a collaborative effort between Cat Around Films and our clients. We are comfortable with assuming full creative control, or working with our clients and their teams, to create effective content that conveys the message that our clients intend to communicate. In the pre-production process, our goal is to determine what type of content will get our clients the results they expect. Once planning and strategy are complete, the stage is set to begin capturing your footage. Our experienced team of directors, cameramen, sound engineers, lighting specialists, art directors, and make-up artists are always eager to get on set and carry out memorable productions for our clients. Cat Around Films maintains an in-house inventory of specialty equipment including cameras, lenses, stabilizers, lighting rigs, drones, audio equipment and much more. Post-production is where the magic happens.Â  This is where the raw content becomes consumable.Â  Our post production studio is complete with all the major elements and talent to make your videos awesome.Â  Our post production team works with our productions as well as that of others.Â  Whether we are working on your entire project or we are your post production team, you can count on us to deliver every time.Â  We always honour our commitments and deadlines and strive to create an amazing experience for everyone.

name: BRANDON & BRANDA
about_us: Brands Acting Human Merken zijn als mensen. Daarom staat de mens centraal in alles wat we bedenken en creÃ«ren. Zo gaan we na wat mensen drijft en hoe we voor onze klanten een zinvolle en duurzame relatie met hen kunnen opbouwen. Want branding en communicatie gaat altijd over mensen. Mensen maken merken Virtuele assistenten, dialogerende chatbots, responsive design, smart packaging, â€¦ De digitalisering grijpt om ons heen. Indrukwekkende technologie, dat wel. Maar leiden digitale kanalen je niet af van je doel, waardoor je merk de voeling met de essentie verliest? Wij geloven dat branding en communicatie over mensen gaat. Mensen kiezen merken, mensen maken merken. Wat drijft mensen naar jouw merk? Een sterk merk herken je aan zijn identiteit. Het is een persoonlijkheid die mensen aanspreekt. Stemt jouw merkimago overeen met hun gedroomde zelfbeeld, dan ontstaat er spontane interactie. Je merk voedt de relatie. En zo verbinden we mensen met merken. Elk merk heeft een sterk verhaal Branding is alles. Een sterk merk is het hele werk. Wij draaien de woordvolgorde om: alles is branding. Alles heeft een verhaal. Daarom luisteren we naar jou en naar de mensen. Wat jouw merk voor hen uniek maakt, daarover hoort het te gaan. Dat verhaal willen mensen horen. Sterke verhalen, daar houden ze van. Wij maken jouw merk sterker We ontwikkelen een brede merkenstrategie. En begeleiden je merk met merkconcepten, design van websites en verpakkingen, creatie van cross-mediale campagnes en acties voor employer branding. Met oog voor de mens. En met het oog op een meetbare return op je investering. Zo maken we je merk sterker. Benieuwd hoe wij jouw merk sterker maken? Contacteer ons via info@brandonbranda.com of bel +32 9 233 65 95

name: Albert Penn
about_us: Albert Penn is a creative advertising agency, partnering with brands and clients to deliver innovative ideas that win big! We believe in the power of story, content and creativity to deliver transformational change and to build trust between brand and consumer. As brands seek to build genuine connection with audiences in an increasingly distracted marketplace, the organisations that embrace the power of story will be those that separate themselves from the noise and gain lasting traction. Like many great stories, ours started with three brothers. Combining their entrepreneurial mindsets, business acumen and penchant for creativity, they created Albert Penn. An agency with creativity at its heart, we solve our clients' most pressing commercial challenges with compelling narratives and inspiring content. Our process integrates 5 keys service areas that are essential in delivering an effective creative campaign. We deliver market research , uncovering valuable behavioural insights that form the bedrock of a campaign. We build creative startegies , definining exactly how our creative idea will solve your commercial problems and connect with your target audience. We produce big ideas , crafting ground-breaking creative ideas that positions your brand as authentic and trustworthy. We execute on campaigns, producing campaign assets and a distribution plan that fullfils your commercial objective. Finally we evaluate performance , measuring audience response and uncovering opportunities for growth. By searching deep into the culture of a brand and understanding their audience, we produce stories that resonate and deliver transformative results. We are an agile and innovative agency based in London with a team of experts obsessed with creativity! Our agency oversees the entire creative process, delivering research, strategy, planning, production and design solutions. We work cross channel, with expertise executing above the line marketing campaigns, as well as digital and social focused activations. We work across the UK and internationally, delivering campaigns domestically and abroad. You can find out more through our website: www.albertpenn.com

name: Frame Forest
about_us: Frame Forest: Your Vision, Our Masterpiece A Premier Post-Production Studio Frame Forest is a leading post-production studio dedicated to transforming raw footage into captivating visual experiences. Our team of 100+ skilled professionals leverages state-of-the-art technology and industry-leading software to deliver exceptional results across a wide range of services. ### Our Services #### Video Post-Production *Precision Editing: Expertly cut, trim, and arrange footage for a polished final product. *Color Grading: Enhance visual aesthetics through meticulous color correction and grading. *Visual Effects: Create stunning effects like green screen compositing, object tracking, and animation. *Sound Design: Immerse audiences with professional sound editing, mixing, and Foley. *Motion Graphics: Bring your ideas to life with dynamic animations, titles, and lower thirds. #### Photography and Image Editing *Photo Enhancement: Optimize image quality, adjust exposure, color, and contrast. *Manipulation: Create composite images, add or remove elements, and retouch imperfections. *Restoration: Restore damaged or faded photos to their original state. #### Content Creation *Video Content: Develop engaging video content for various platforms, including commercials, documentaries, and social media. *Social Media Content: Create visually appealing and shareable content for social media platforms. *Brand Storytelling: Craft compelling narratives that resonate with your target audience and strengthen your brand identity. #### Animation *2D Animation: Bring characters and objects to life through traditional animation techniques. *3D Animation:Create realistic and immersive animations using advanced 3D software. *Unreal Engine: Utilize the power of Unreal Engine for real-time rendering, game development, and interactive experiences. ### Our Expertise Our team comprises experienced professionals who are passionate about their craft. Our editors, colorists, VFX artists, sound engineers, and content creators possess a deep understanding of the post-production process and are dedicated to delivering exceptional results. ### Our Commitment to Quality At Frame Forest, quality is paramount. We adhere to rigorous quality control standards and utilize the latest industry best practices to ensure that every project meets our exacting requirements. ### Our Team Our team is composed of 100+ highly skilled professionals who are passionate about their craft. Our management team is dedicated to fostering a collaborative and supportive work environment, where innovation and creativity thrive. ### Our Technical Capabilities *Software: Adobe Creative Suite (Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop, Audition), DaVinci Resolve, Cinema 4D, Unreal Engine *Hardware: High-performance workstations with powerful processors, GPUs, and ample storage *Workflows: Efficient and streamlined workflows to meet tight deadlines *Collaboration: Seamless collaboration with clients and team members through cloud-based platforms ### Frame Forest: Your Trusted Partner With our expertise, dedication, and commitment to excellence, Frame Forest is your trusted partner for all your post-production needs. Let us help you elevate your visual narratives and achieve your creative goals.

name: Asia Media Publishing Group
about_us: At Asia Media Publishing Group, we are the leading marketing and PR agency in Thailand, with a focus on delivering international, multilingual, and multi-media services. Our founder and CEO, Markus Kreth, has over 12 years of experience in SE Asia, making us the most reliable and current agency in the region. At Asia Media Publishing Group, we are dedicated to delivering international quality services to a broad range of clients from all disciplines and commerce. Contact us today to learn more about how we can help your business thrive in SE Asia.

name: OFG
about_us: Siamo unâ€™agenzia di comunicazione full-service che costruisce narrazioni di brand rilevanti e riconoscibili, dalla strategia allâ€™ultimo contenuto. Ci prendiamo cura del tuo brand . Il brand non Ã¨ solo un logo, un colore o una strategia di marketing: Ã¨ un ecosistema fatto di idee, valori e percezioni. Il brand va nutrito, protetto e fatto crescere con strategia, coerenza tra i touchpoint e costanza nel tempo. Facciamo strategia ma anche esecuzione . Analisi e strategie di comunicazione: individuiamo lâ€™essenza del tuo brand e lo posizioniamo in modo che parli al pubblico giusto, nel modo giusto. CreativitÃ  e design: trasformiamo concetti in immagini, parole ed esperienze che lasciano il segno. VisibilitÃ  e produzione di contenuti: diamo visibilitÃ  al tuo brand, mantenendo ogni touchpoint allineato alla tua identitÃ . Lavoriamo con 3 principi che ci guidano . Siamo veloci . Cresciuti con i tempi della GDO, siamo strutturati per rispondere a qualsiasi esigenza. Gestiamo carichi pesanti . Ci integriamo nei tuoi processi per gestire anche i flussi di lavoro piÃ¹ intensi, senza rallentarti. Non ti molliamo mai . Anche nei momenti piÃ¹ stressanti, le tue scadenze sono le nostre scadenze. Rimaniamo fedeli ai nostri valori . Diamo forma alle idee . Trasformiamo ogni idea in un progetto concreto, traducendole in strategie efficaci e soluzioni realizzabili. Il nostro obiettivo non Ã¨ solo pensare in grande, ma rendere grande ciÃ² che pensiamo. Troviamo soluzioni, sempre . Ci piace affrontare problemi complessi con un approccio non solo strategico e creativo, ma anche pratico. Non ci limitiamo a risolvere le criticitÃ : cerchiamo la strada migliore per trasformarle in risultati concreti. Crediamo nelle relazioni . Ogni progetto Ã¨ unâ€™occasione per costruire un legame duraturo, fatto di ascolto, collaborazione e visione condivisa. Per noi, il valore di un rapporto conta piÃ¹ di una semplice collaborazione. Facciamo bene, facciamo giusto . Lavoriamo con attenzione, etica e responsabilitÃ , mettendo cura in ogni dettaglio e rispettando le persone, i clienti e lâ€™ambiente in cui operiamo. Fare bene significa anche fare la cosa giusta. Il nostro manifesto Ogni brand ha una storia, ma non tutti sanno raccontarla. Noi lo facciamo in modo che la gente ascolti davvero. Le storie non si inventano, si scoprono. Scaviamo sotto la superficie per trovare lâ€™anima del brand. quella vera. Niente storytelling se manca il senso. La forma Ã¨ importante, ma prima viene la sostanza. sempre. I brand non parlano da soli. Li aiutiamo a trovare tono, voce, ritmo e a usarli bene. Ovunque. Una storia che funziona non fa solo boom, fa eco. Una buona storia lascia il segno. una grande storia costruisce unâ€™identitÃ . Non raccontiamo favole, costruiamo narrazioni credibili che siano coerenti, forti, e capaci di evolversi con il tempo. La creativitÃ  non basta, serve strategia. Ogni parola, ogni immagine, ogni scelta visiva ha un perchÃ©. Traduciamo i concetti in realtÃ . Dal manifesto alla campagna, dal brand book al punto vendita: tutto deve essere messo a terra. Ascoltiamo prima di scrivere. PerchÃ© ogni storia di marca inizia da chi la vive: clienti, persone, contesto. Le storie sono potenti, ma devono essere efficaci. Il nostro obiettivo Ã¨ costruire brand che durano nel tempo.
